highlights: An ongoing endeavor to practice and improve my math, design, and programming skills by creating & publishng a new animation every day.
Researched, planned, and proposed a directed study to address the issue of digital clutter.
Devised & executed a series of user questionnaires, interviews, and usability tests to gain a better understanding of the problem space.
Designed & iterated on an interface to support the task of digital decluttering, based on the results of the study.
An ongoing endeavour to develop and maintain a digital space for my work, writing, and other projects.
Currently incorporates a main landing page, blog site, and portfolio site.
Developed & updated features for the Peko Produce online storefront, including a major product launch & a regional expansion.
Streamlined and automated a variety of operational processes, including inventory management, order fulfillment, and customer support.
Managed/maintained codebase and documentation, onboarded interns, and owned technical knowledge/processes.
A repository for my thoughts, ideas, and reflections on various topics, including technology, art, and personal development.
Has gone through multiple redesigns and rebuilds, but currently exists as a Quartz-powered static site.
Developed over the course of mid-semester reading break.
Designed simple, clean, & responsive interface to be adapted & reused for other people's portfolios.
Implemented basic data model for customizability, reusability, & separation of content & presentation.
Developed an interactive simulation based on academic research on the slime mold Physarum polycephalum.
Designed & programmed a web-based interface to allow users to interact with the simulation, exploring the emergent properties of the slime mold.
Showcased at the Hatch Art Gallery as part of the Climate Catharsis exhibition.
Brainstormed & established requirements for a web-based platform to facilitate casual local event planning.
Designed & implemented a basic working prototype (including user authentication & database integration) of the platform within a 24h period.
Studied a variety of parallel algorithms, memory systems, & architectures.
Gained hands-on experience programming & optimizing CUDA kernels on a GPU.
Analyzed a variety of performance pitfalls & improvements for parallel programs.
Learned the fundamentals of user-centered design, including user research, prototyping, and evaluation.
Developed a study protocol in order to evaluate the usability of an existing web interface.
Designed & iterated on an updated interface design based on the results of the study.
Built crucial user features on low time/resource budgets, including the public inventory database, blog/recipe templates, and FAQ system.
Worked with designers to implement multiple site redesigns and rebrands.
Managed/maintained codebase and documentation, onboarded interns, and owned technical knowledge/processes from start-up phase to company acquisition.
Contributed to development of pre-order, raffle, and try-before-you-buy selling models, allowing merchants to sell products in new ways.
Worked on the implementation of a deferred payment checkout flow which lead to over $3M in raffle order revenue in 1 month.
Exposed internal services on a GraphQL API to allow pre-orders, raffles, and TBYB business models for merchants using Shopifyâ€™s headless commerce platform.
Built, tested, deployed, and iterated on a web-based puzzle game using Flutter, focusing on the platform-agnostic responsiveness, interactions, & animations.
Programmed data model & game logic, including randomized level generation & scaling difficulty.
Learned how to design & rig a small set of assets & animations for the game.
Automated KPI reporting tasks via Google Sheets integrations, saving over 4 hours of analysis work per week
Owned and developed processes for qualitative and quantitative reporting at various levels, from team-specific to C-suite and organization-wide.
Coordinated communication across subteams, scheduling meetings and cross-referencing data to ensure smooth alignment and collaboration
Worked with subteam of mechanical engineers from design phase to early testing phases of an electric motorbike, focusing on the integration of displays and monitoring.
Built a prototype system for both logging and streaming real-time engine data to a web-based dashboard, allowing engineers to remotely observe state during live tests.
Brainstormed & established requirements for a web-based app to share & arrange virtual sticky notes.
Designed & implemented a basic working prototype (including real-time collaboration & room registration) of the app within a 24h period.
Implemented basic features during early-stage development of the web app and database.
Added pagination to SQL list queries using timestamp-offset continuation tokens, preventing skipped items and removing the need for server-side state.
Implemented Clojure specification library to validate data structure integrity at REST endpoints.
